ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: We thank Vincent Careau, Sara Edwards, Stephen Heard, Nicolas Rode, Howard Rundle and Alice Winn for their advice on analyses and suggestions for improving earlier versions of this manuscript. Nicole Darling, Braydon Hall, Sheena Parsons, Rebecca Rabinovitch, Christina Thomsen and Marina Torreblanca provided assistance with field work. We thank the landowners of the property that contained the old field (who wish to remain anonymous) for generously allowing us to perform this study on their land. Funding for this study was provided by an Early Researcher of Ontario Award and Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada Discovery Grant to RDS.
Data for this study are available at the Dryad Digital Repository: https://doi.org/10.5061/dryad.8pk0p2nk4
